column4: can anyone guide me on how I can setup a subdomain for my domain name. I host the domain on my own server. i want something.domain.com. please help me. the server runs on hardy server edition
- you want help with bind entries?  try #bind or #dns
iam totally new in the concept so pls give me some tutorial link so tht i can get detailed idea
- well I'd recommend you google a tutorial on bind... it's been a few years since I've managed A records and setup zones in bind...
